body: Uchiharama, my bad, but I wasn't really talking about the new Taimanin one at all, I was thinking about the first one with Yukikaze.
TheJackdaw, Nero stated on his Twitter than with the Taimanin ones aren't connected in anyway.

In the taiminin one, Tatsurou(?) brought that shit on himself and started fucking his girls mother right in front of her.  Dude also ended up their sex slave, but the trend is that rarely does the person getting NTR get thrown to the wayside in neromashin's works. The last one was the school girl hooker that was a massive whore.  Dude getting NTRed still ended up fucking her multiple times.  He was heart broken, but just had the terrible luck of his crush being a gigantic whore.  In this one, year, she's a gigantic whore as well, but MC also doesn't have the stereotypical micro dick you see in a lot of these stories and pure NTR doesn't really seem to be a thing neromshin does a lot.  They love doing some fucked up shit, but straight up NTR isn't really one of them.

IDK, man, if this gets a sequel or a series made out of it, I don't think it will be a straight up NTR where the dude gets his soul crushed as the girl leaves him forever to ride a conveyer belt of dicks until the day she dies.  Neromashin doesn't really do that that much.  The only one I can think of that does is the one with the horse dudes.  The other major elf series has the elf husband get cucked and both his wife and daughter turned into sex slaves, but by chapter three, dudes fucking his entire extended family, his daughter is constantly jumping his bones, he occasionally uses his vety broken wife for sexual relief and he's impregnated a bunch of them.  By chapter 5 or 6 he married his daughter.  Incredibly fucked up, but at least he's happy.  In the gundam doujin, the girl got mind broken and the two kids that would've been in the receiving end of serious NTR in probably any other story decided they wanted to fuck her too and the other dudes are like, why the fuck not?
FUCK ALL OF YOU Ez Clap GlitchLit LET EM KNOW
Ayo!!! WTF!!!. This girl really shat on his face. LMFAO. Wow, The disrespect. 😂😂😂😂

On the whole if there is a follow up it's pretty obvious she'll become a sex slave to the new dudes instead, they'll sell her or something while the dude get's his heart crushed or even killed most likely. If not the ending is pretty much the girl will stick with him cause she loves him but because he can't accept her nympho/perverted side and she's afraid to show it to him she'll probably keep drugging him and keep fucking other guys behind his back. I mean he knows about her sexual training and all but he probably thinks that after what she's been through she hates sex.

The start is that the kid is a noble and the elf was a servant/sex slave at his house that the dad was training and using. He saw it and decided to save her since he loves her so he eventually escapes from the noble house with her and becomes and adventurer. Then they go around and adventure and apparently every night she would drug him and then masturbate on his face since shes still a super nympho and cause of all the training and with him not doing anything and being all innocent. The two dudes are just random adventurers that recently joined their group and because they thought the food was iffy they didn¨'t eat it and fell asleep.

Then they see her masterbating to the kid and offer her their dicks instead which she quickly accepts because of her sex slave training. Then it's pretty much them just calling her a whore, greedy pig bla bla bla while it talks about her upbrining and training to become a sex slave. All the while she keeps saying she loves the kid shes just unable to live without dicks and since he's not doing anything she has to get it from other places. Then the end part is pretty much info that the dad who trained her had a scat fetish so in a twisted way her shitting on him is her showing love, though the two guys laughs at it. There is also the part were he wakes up when he's about to get shat at and then he wakes up thinking it was all a bad dream and the girl saying she loves him.
Everything was all fine and good until the shit shows up
I mean if she's still staying with him despite both of them know her past, then just train her yourself and not to mention this guy seems pretty strong sooooo.
